title: Champion Mastery is the dumbest idea ever.
body: People only use it to BM you, it's just another way for the toxic community to show off more toxicity.  If it's not going to be removed we should atleast be able to mute the enemy's champion emotes. We can't even block people without adding them first on this new client.  Riot PLEASE.  Can you get your shit together please?  Honestly, champion mastery was such a dumb idea. Maybe it wouldn't be so bad on a server that isn't as toxic as OCE but I'm just sick of it.  I doubt riot even cares because people have been complaining about toxic players not being punished and don't seem to care.

replies.body: if a tiny colored badge upsets you this much you probably dont have the emotional capacity to play this game anyway

LOL upvote

I know that feel. Some people really do overuse that emote. Perhaps putting it on a longer cooldown might be a decent compromise to outright removing it. It's possible that some players might even give up on it if they can't get that instant gratification they seem to crave.
I've only ever seen people use it after making good plays, then again the sour puss's who lost to those plays become toxic and see it as toxic i guess.

THrey don't care because their system take care of them. Plus I don't know why you think they are "toxic", it's a way to show off your performance and skill with the champion. I doubt riot want to implement more toxicity into the game
I'm sure removing these so called "Toxic Emotes" are the least of Riot's worries.
